  2. Artificial intelligence 'doom calculator' is predicting people's deaths  USA TODAY
  3. AI death calculator predicts when you’ll die — it’s ‘extremely’ accurate  New York Post
  4. Using sequences of life-events to predict human lives  Nature.com
  5. New AI model can predict human lifespan, researchers say. They want to make sure it's used for good  Phys.org

item.title: Donald Trump said an ad used AI to make him look bad. The clips are real. - Tampa Bay Times
item.description: Donald Trump said an ad used AI to make him look bad. The clips are real.  Tampa Bay Times
